thread.title: ROMAN CONTRERAS
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by ROMAN CONTRERAS

author: ROMAN CONTRERAS
title: ROMAN CONTRERAS
text: Great experience from the very beginning when the IRS put a tax lien hold on my bank acct.. Got ahold of Optima and they got the lien off that very day... Optima stayed in constant contact with me throughout the process... At the end not only did I get my case resolved, the IRS owed me money and next thing I know I got a refund check from them... Oh the pleasure in that, since they were claiming I owed more than 50K....
